subject: Interim Assistance General M
body:
Interim Assistance General Manager.
Operations, Maintenance, Transportation
Norfolk International Airport
2200 Norview Ave, Norfolk, VA 23518
Virginia, United States of America
Your Abandoned Package For Delivery
Dear 
I acknowledge the receipt of your mail.
If you attempted to transfer from my Chase bank branch, what was the response? If it does not work I urge you to take the money and walk into any Bank of America bank close to you and make a cash deposit to the same account and get back to me with a scanned transfer/transaction slip as earlier stated for confirmation.
As soon as the officer in charge of issuing the clearance certificate confirms you have made the payment of USD$850.00 for the demurrage fee, I will make my flight schedule available to you to know my time of arrival in your city with the consignment tomorrow.
I hope you recognise my effort so far in this process, in ensuring safe delivery and to guide against any unforeseen circumstance.
I wait for your urgent compliance.
Warmest regards,
Reymond Adams
Interim Assistance General Manager,
Operations,Maintenance,Transportation
Norfolk International Airport
2200 Norview Ave, Norfolk, VA 23518
Virginia, United States of America
God Bless America

subject: Re:   Interim Assistance General M
body:
Hello Reymond Adams,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring the safe delivery of my package. 

I'm a bit confused about the process though. Could you please explain why I need to pay a demurrage fee? And what exactly is a demurrage fee? 

Also, could you provide more details about this package? I don't recall expecting any deliveries.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Amanda
